title: Art Piece 1

title: This is title text for entry 2
body: Due to my boyfriend's lovely piano planing, I had to create this piece with such vivid colors in an attempt to capture the picture he paints with the hammers of the piano.

title: This piece has the title: Art Piece No. 3
body: This is the body text for entry 3. It was inspired by my soon to be Fianc√©'s body. That is why it is so amazing.

title: -1 is an intresting choice
body: What made you think that a negative number would make any sense for an art peice? However, how do you know that is a negative? It might just be a dash. And do you know what two dashes does?

title: -- = fast
body: dash dash is an extra fast becuase a dash is a fast which makes a dash dash an extra fast. However, enough with these silly dashes, lets go back to negative numbers. What would be the most meaningless negative number? Probably one that is also equal to its postive counterpart.
